name: Gnarrly Bear
description:
Gnarrly bear is a creature much loved by many...loved for being a sucker and some might say for being too nice! He loves to help and is always ready to lend a hand but sometimes that can lead to others taking advantage so he becomes very gnarrly, has a rant then goes back to being his sweet self! Just keep those fingers away from his teeth...
*Please note that Gnarrly bears are made using vintage fabric and so no two are ever alike due to sourcing and availability of fabric.
Please note that due to small parts this is not suitable for children under the age of 3 yrs old.
Approximate size:
H:10cm
W:12cm

name: Hunny Bunny
description:
You'll find them partying into the small hours with Xama-Xama(rock star flames),
the hunny bunny is a naughty little creature who loves to create havock. But once you've gotten over their pyromaniac tendencies and excepted all their flaws you'll realise that they have a heart of gold...just keep the matches in a safe place!
Hand made, tweed, original munano design bunny doll.
Suitable for children of all ages and grown ups.
Approximate size:
H: 33cm
W: 25 cm (arm to arm)

name: Xama Xama
description:
Xama-Xama and his troop were once part of "europe's"(the band) stage show...yes,that "europe"! Now is not the time to discuss musical tastes but I'm sure you know exactly who I'm talking about... let's get back to it...
They've had enough of hair metal bands and being shot out of pyrotechnic
canons and headed off into the forest for a free-er life. Old habits die old though and being very rock n roll they love to party so sometimes they can get out of hand! Just like any forest fire they need attention and taming.
Please note that due to small parts not suitable for children under 3 yrs old. Please contact me if you would like it made "child friendly" before ordering.
Approximate size:
H: 15cm
W:15cm

name: Poop d'Loup
description:
Known as the messenger of the forests,Poop de Loup can be found all over the lush green woods of the world.
Originating in France (Loup...Wolf in French and poop is poop!) he traveled by hitching rides on ramblers shoes (yuck...that's so economy class!),by sticking close to car tyres or ridding piggy back on his forest friends.
His message is simple...
"Respect nature and your fellow animals!"

Approximate dimensions:
H: 24cm
W: 30cm
Please note that due to small parts this tou may not be suitable for small children.

name: Murou Murou
description:
Murou-Murou is the giver of dreams...and nightmares too!
A lovely felt creature,soft to the touch,
he walks around the forests slowly and quietly
sprinkling mini murou and their "magic spores"
onto sleeping creatures and humans to aid restfull and pleasant sleep.
Watch out though sometimes the mushrooms turn black and
give the sleeper some horrid nightmares. Nothing too scary...
but sometimes dreams can tell you a lot about yourself!

Please note that this doll is a double sided felt creature...a good side and a bad side! Images denotes the front and back of the item.
Approximate size:
H: 22cm
W: 19cm
